name: SOP for New Service Onboarding on Production.txt - Pre Onboarding Steps:
description: This section provides a link to a Google Document containing detailed documentation related to the Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for onboarding new services on the production environment. The link serves as a reference for anyone involved in the onboarding process to access the comprehensive guidelines and instructions outlined in the document.
use_cases: Onboarding new services to the production environment
Referring to the SOP documentation for the onboarding process
Accessing centralized documentation for service onboarding
Ensuring adherence to established procedures and best practices
